com.nexmo.sdk.core.client

Class ClientBuilderException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.nexmo.sdk.core.client.ClientBuilderException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ClientBuilderException
extends java.lang.Exception
    ClientBuilderException indicates that an instance of NexmoClient cannot be acquired. In most cases this means some mandatory params are not being set, and building a NexmoClient fails. When exceptions are thrown, they should be caught by the application code.
    See Also:
